text: The SQL processing agent inserts UDR data into a database table according to your definitions of mapping between UDR fields and database table columns. The agent also enables you to populate database columns with MIM values either by using a plain SQL statement or by invoking a stored procedure that inserts the data. Note! Supported database commands depend on the JDBC driver of the database. The section contains the following subsections: SQL Processing Agent Configuration - Real-Time SQL Forwarding Agent Transaction Behavior, Input/Output Data and MIM - Real-Time SQL Processing Agent Events - Real-Time Example of SQL Processing Agent in Real-Time Workflow Handling Erroneous UDRs - Real-Time
title: SQL Processing Agent in Real-Time Workflows - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
